mapper.select: SELECT st_name stName, st_school stSchool, st_id stId FROM st
SELECT st_name as stName, st_school as stSchool, st_id as stId FROM st WHERE st_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stName}, '%')
SELECT st_id stId, st_name stName, st_school stSchool, st_phone stPhone, st_parents stParents, st_date stDate, st_gender stGender, st_address stAddress, st_memo stMemo FROM st WHERE st_id = #{stId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO st(st_phone, st_name, st_school, st_parents, st_date, st_gender, st_address, st_memo) VALUES (#{stPhone}, #{stName}, #{stSchool}, #{stParents}, #{stDate}, #{stGender}, #{stAddress}, #{stMemo})
